nodes.text: Lumiya's fleet was a fleet of Imperial starships controlled by Lumiya at the time of the Battle of Endor and its immediate aftermath. She used it to enforce her will as a warlord and claimant Dark Lady of the Sith, giving support to the Tof and to the aspirations of Carnor Jax. During the Yuuzhan Vong War, her fleet battled the invaders to a standstill at the Battle of Yaga Minor. The fleet was lost sometime during the war.
